question: The difference between a PLA and a PAL is:

options.A: the PLA has a programmable OR plane and a programmable AND plane, while the PAL only has a programmable AND plane
options.B: the PAL has a programmable OR plane and a programmable AND plane, while the PLA only has a programmable AND plane
options.C: the PAL has more possible product terms than the PLA
options.D: PALs and PLAs are the same thing.
